description: Dive into "Marbella's Hidden Trails and Coastal Wonders" ‚Äî a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Marbella's Hidden Trails and Coastal Wonders

places.generalDescription: Cabopino Beach is a spacious and popular destination in Marbella, offering a variety of activities for visitors. The beach features dunes, nearby restaurants, water sports, swimming areas, and a bustling nudist section. Additionally, the area boasts an array of leisure facilities including restaurants, shops with international fashion brands and luxury items. This part of Marbella offers 26 kilometers of coastline with modern hotels, residential developments, shops and restaurants.

sources.shortName: Hiking in Marbella: A Guide to Scenic Walks

places.name: Cabopino Beach

reviews.text: Beautiful day in January with 17C weather, stunning colors and fresh breeze from the sea. If you enjoy walking on the beach, next to big sand dunes, this is your place.
It's a great beach! I love the nudist part most because it makes me feel very blessed that I don't have a small chode like most other men.

A bit underwhelming, water is clean and the beach is sandy but the black sand made the entire sea look grayish and not blue. But overall a good beach. Beware of high waves and nude people because these were not clear in the reviews.

places.generalDescription: Puerto Deportivo de Marbella is a vibrant and lively area, especially at night. The port is filled with bars and restaurants, making it a popular nightlife spot. Visitors can enjoy music and dancing at clubs like Discoteca Old Vic or La Clave for Latin dancing. The marina offers a great atmosphere with various boat activities going on, surrounded by beautiful beaches to the east and west.

sources.snippet: Aufstieg vom Stadtrand Marbellas √ºber den Pass Puerto de Marbella und auf den Cruz de Juanar. Abstieg zum Regugio El Juanar.
sources.shortName: The most beautiful routes in Marbella

places.name: Puerto Deportivo de Marbella

reviews.text:
Sunny, colourful spot.
We visited in the beginning of April so we could enjoy most of it almost people free. Not many tourists as the weather was still not very warm, having said that, we managed to get tanned and dipped in the sea üòÅ
A lot of different cafes and restaurants around. Underground parking is conveniently close to the beach.
Not as posh as Porto Banus, marina, however still plenty of eateries to enjoy, whilst observing the lovely boats, and watching the world go by
What a place to visit. Simply beautiful. Lovely golden sands. Designer shops. Not forgetting the luxury yatchts .

places.address: LUGAR PUERTO DEPORTIVO DE MARBELLA VIRGEN DEL CARMEN, S-N, 29602 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: The Paseo Maritimo, a paved promenade that runs alongside the beach, is an essential part of any coastal holiday. It offers breathtaking views and a relaxing atmosphere, making it the perfect place to enjoy one of the region's stunning sunsets. Recently, the promenade has been connected to a beautiful wooden boardwalk, allowing visitors to take longer walks from Marbella all the way to Puerto Banus and beyond towards San Pedro.

sources.snippet: The Paseo Mar√≠timo is not just a charming coastal walkway through Marbella, it‚Äôs also an integral part of the Senda Litoral. This ambitious project was designed by the Junta de Andaluc√≠a to create a continuous coastal path spanning 180 kms across the Costa del Sol, from Manilva in the west to Nerja in the east.
sources.shortName: Hiking in Marbella: A Guide to Scenic Walks

places.name: PASEO MAR√çTIMO

reviews.text:
Our first ‚Äògreat meal' in Spain.  The restaurant is newly redone.  I think we were actually the first customers since they reopened.

Poke bowls were great.  Definitely try the crunchy rice.  It's great...  The onion rings were the best I've ever had.  Thick onions in a Panko crust with a fantastic BBQ dipping sauce.  The pizza oven and wood grill look amazing - very well appointed.

The kids meal - chicken fingers - was a hit with both the kids and the parents.  The French fries are wonderful!

I would not hesitate to recommend it.  For the food and location, it is a great choice!
Amazing experience, this place is on par with the best Steakhouses in New York. Absolutely loved it.
Very nice staff and delicious food. Service was good and surroundings comfortable and cosy

places.address: Av. Duque de Ahumada, 9, 29602 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: Ruta - Puerta Verde de Marbella offers a pleasant and non-technical trail with fantastic views of the lake, Istan, the sea, mountains, La Concha, hills, vegetation, and the ocean. The starting point is easily accessible for parking. It's recommended to start early to avoid intense heat. The trail is suitable for families but requires comfortable boots and plenty of water in hot weather. With its panoramic views and beautiful nature, it's highly recommended for walks in winter.

sources.snippet: Climbing the iconic La Concha Our favorite, climbing La Concha with the absolute highlight of reaching the top ‚ÄùPico de La Concha‚Äù. Truly a beautiful route with special views of Marbella city, the surrounding area and more beautiful views of the sea.
sources.shortName: Beautiful hiking trails and routes in Marbella

places.name: Ruta - Puerta Verde de Marbella

reviews.text: Been to this trail 5-6 times, every time great views and not that many people so you got the beautiful nature for yourself. I'd start the run earlier to finish before the real hit kicks in. Not a technical trail, suitable for families too
Breathtaking views. Fantastic experience. Will come again and explore more paths.

A lovely hike, would highly recommend! But don't trust google maps! It wanted us to drive 25 minutes when we live 5 minutes from there. We almost died and destroyed the car because of the suggested map to the hike.

places.address: C. las Aguilas, 168, 29660 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: La Concha, a towering mountain in the Sierra Blanca coastal range, offers a picturesque view of Marbella and the coast of Morocco. Rising over 1200 meters high, it features steep valleys with magnificent pine and oak trees. The peak provides an impressive vista that extends all the way to Morocco's Atlas Mountains, far beyond Marbella. It takes about four hours to reach the summit from El Refugio de Januar, offering adventurous hikers a rewarding experience.

sources.shortName: The most beautiful hiking routes in Marbella

places.name: La Concha

reviews.text: Great Tex mex style food with incredible views and great drinks !
nice place just for adults

places.address: Av. Bulevar Pr√≠ncipe Alfonso de Hohenlohe, 29602 Marbella, M√°laga, Spain

places.generalDescription: La Quinta Golf & Country Club is a golfer's paradise nestled in the picturesque Golf Valley, designed by renowned Spanish golfers Antonio Garrido and Manuel Pinero. This stunning venue features three distinct 9-hole courses‚ÄîSan Pedro, Ronda, and Guadaiza‚Äîthat can be played in various combinations to suit your preferences. The course is beautifully integrated into the natural landscape of the Mediterranean coast, surrounded by majestic mountains and offering breathtaking views of the sea.

sources.snippet: One of the most iconic hikes in Marbella, the ascent to La Concha, the queen of Sierra Blanca, offers panoramic views that are unmatched. This challenging trail takes you through various types of forests and along a ridge that creates the famous microclimate of the Costa del Sol.

places.name: La Quinta Golf & Country Club

reviews.text:
La Quinta GC is a great place to play.
27 holes. Peaceful tempo.
Green very fast but ball roling was smooth. Bunkers are fare and sand was maintained well.

As a full time wedding celebrant I officiate at many venues and 100% recommend La Quinta.
The staff are super friendly, super helpful and super keen to ensure the wedding couple and their guests enjoy their best possible day.
Debbie Skyrme, Celebrant Spain

La Quinta is a great hotel, the on-site amenities were perfect, the grounds where amazing. The golf course was overall in good condition, there were a few parts/greens that weren't great but that's fine and it played well (although very hard course).

The staff were all very friendly and helpful (hotel staff and golf course staff) my only issues were the room. I expected a lot better from a 5 star resort. The room was in dire need of a refurb, the coffee machine in the room was great but that was about it. Severe lack of English TV channels, the iPhone Dock was broken, the bathroom door would not shut properly or even lock, the bathroom overall wasn't in the greatest condition. The beds and bedding were nice though.

Overall it was a very pleasant trip but I expect a lot more from the room considering the price and the 5 star status.

places.address: Av. Tom√°s Pascual, 22, 29678 Benahav√≠s, M√°laga, Spain

sources.snippet: The Paseo Mar√≠timo is not just a charming coastal walkway through Marbella, it‚Äôs also an integral part of the Senda Litoral. This ambitious project was designed by the Junta de Andaluc√≠a to create a continuous coastal path spanning 180 kms across the Costa del Sol, from Manilva in the west to Nerja in the east.
sources.shortName: Hiking in Marbella: A Guide to Scenic Walks

reviews.text: THE beach walk you dream about when you picture a beach holiday. 30km of uninterrupted walkway, beautiful for walks and runs ‚Ä¶ dog-friendly and perfectly clean and well-kept. Beautiful at all times of day but sunsets are unbeatable (in my opinion). Lots of great restaurants along the way to have some tapas, drinks, or even proper meals.
8am 6km walk every morning, heavenly bliss, peace & quiet, sea air, osmosis, sunrise, sunset, the best ......
Very nice route for walking, running or cycling. The wooden structure is very safe and comfortable to run on.

places.generalDescription: Experience the luxury of Golden Mile Services with a fine dining experience at their gourmet restaurant, where you can savor the delightful Mediterranean cuisine. Following your meal, take a leisurely walk along the picturesque Paseo Maritimo seafront promenade, enjoying the enchanting view of yachts and the soothing sound of waves for a truly magical evening.

sources.snippet: Explore the captivating journey of walking the Golden Mile in Marbella. Immerse yourself in adventure and discover the allure of this iconic coastal path.
sources.shortName: Beautiful hiking trails and routes in Marbella

places.name: Golden Mile Services
